001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ModuleLaunchingToolCall;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ProcessStartingToolCall;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ToolRunningToolCall;
006import java.io.File;
007import java.lang.module.ModuleFinder;
008import java.nio.file.Path;
009import java.util.ArrayList;
010import java.util.Collection;
011import java.util.List;
012import java.util.Optional;
013import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
014import java.util.stream.Collectors;
015
016/** Builds named tool calls with their arguments. */
017public sealed interface ToolCall
018    permits ToolRunningToolCall, ProcessStartingToolCall, ModuleLaunchingToolCall {
019
020  String name();
021
022  List<String> arguments();
023
024  static ToolCall of(String name, Object... arguments) {
025    return ToolCall.of(null, name, arguments);
026  }
027
028  static ToolCall of(ToolFinder finder, String name, Object... arguments) {
029    return new ToolRunningToolCall(Optional.ofNullable(finder), name, new ArrayList<>())
030        .withAll(arguments);
031  }
032
033  static ToolCall java(Object... arguments) {
034    var java = Configuration.computeJavaExecutablePath("java");
035    return ToolCall.process(java, arguments);
036  }
037
038  static ToolCall process(Path executable, Object... arguments) {
039    return new ProcessStartingToolCall(executable, new ArrayList<>()).withAll(arguments);
040  }
041
042  static ToolCall module(ModuleFinder finder, String name, Object... arguments) {
043    return new ModuleLaunchingToolCall(finder, name, new ArrayList<>()).withAll(arguments);
044  }
045
046  default ToolCall with(Object argument) {
047    arguments().add(argument.toString());
048    return this;
049  }
050
051  default ToolCall with(String option, Object value, Object... more) {
052    return with(option).with(value).withAll(more);
053  }
054
055  default ToolCall with(String option, Collection<Path> paths) {
056    return with(option).with(paths, File.pathSeparator);
057  }
058
059  default ToolCall with(Collection<?> arguments, CharSequence delimiter) {
060    if (arguments.isEmpty()) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Collection must not be empty");
061    return with(arguments.stream().map(Object::toString).collect(Collectors.joining(delimiter)));
062  }
063
064  default ToolCall withAll(Object... arguments) {
065    return withAll(List.of(arguments));
066  }
067
068  default ToolCall withAll(Collection<?> arguments) {
069    arguments.stream().map(Object::toString).forEach(arguments()::add);
070    return this;
071  }
072
073  /** A tool call arguments tweaker. */
074  interface Composer extends UnaryOperator<ToolCall> {
075
076    /** {@return a tool call composer that always returns the same call instance} */
077    static Composer identity() {
078      return call -> call;
079    }
080  }
081}
